/.*\\.fandom\\.com.lambda: const name = url.host.split('.')[0]; const u = new URL(`https://antifandom.com/${name}${url.pathname}`); return u;
/.*\\.fandom\\.com.author: PRO-2684

wiki.lambda: const p = url.pathname.slice(6); return new URL(`https://www.wikiwand.com/en/${p}`);
wiki.author: PRO-2684

wiki.lambda: const lang = url.host.split('.')[0]; const p = url.pathname.slice(6); return new URL(`https://www.wikiwand.com/${lang}/${p}`);
wiki.author: PRO-2684
